blockquote.p: The first design of the Laboratory Report foresaw that only Observations were referred by the Composition.section.entry.
The idea was that when a group of results needed to be managed, the Observation resource would be used for this scope.

This choice seems however not yet globally agreed. In some contexts in fact the DiagnosticReport is used not only to represent a complete report, but also a grouper of Laboratory results (e.g. panel).
For this reason, in this ballot version, the option of having a DiagnosticReport as possible entry has been added.

p.b: Ballotters are invited to express their opinions on this choice
